alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 1:39AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the wind chill advisory for Friday night and Saturday morning the wind chill values could be as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, southwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...Until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. A Wind Chill Advisory means that very cold air and strong winds will combine to generate low wind chills. This will result in frostbite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
